plot: In 1921 during the Anglo-Irish War a pair of IRA soldiers are ordered to guard two British prisoners, but face a dilemma when they bond with their captives.
title: Guests of the Nation
plot_es: In 1921 during the Anglo-Irish War a pair of IRA soldiers are ordered to guard two British prisoners, but face a dilemma when they bond with their captives.
plot_en: In 1921 during the Anglo-Irish War a pair of IRA soldiers are ordered to guard two British prisoners, but face a dilemma when they bond with their captives.

cast.role: IRA member who rises flag /              imprisoned IRA member
cast.name: Cyril Cusack
